entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
